thread.title: Manchester United eye Eric Dier as Jose Mourinho considers £35million summer swoop for Tottenham star
thread.title_full: Manchester United eye Eric Dier as Jose Mourinho considers £35million summer swoop for Tottenham star

author: ashilton
title: Manchester United eye Eric Dier as Jose Mourinho considers £35million summer swoop for Tottenham star
text:
LOOKING FOR ERIC Manchester United eye Eric Dier as Jose Mourinho considers £35million summer swoop for Tottenham star 
United chief Mourinho is a huge fan of the 23-year-old England midfielder and has watched him a number of times Exclusive Comments MANCHESTER UNITED boss Jose Mourinho is eyeing a sensational £35m move for Tottenham star Eric Dier. 
The United chief is a huge fan of the 23-year-old England midfielder and has watched him on a number of occasions. PA:Press Association Manchester United are eyeing a £35million move for Eric Dier 
SunSport understands Mourinho was planning to make a swoop for the ex-Sporting Lisbon ace in January. 
Keep up to date with ALL the Manchester United news, gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
But Spurs instantly rejected all talk of a transfer and were prepared to reject any offers in excess of £45m for one of their star men. 
Mauricio Pochettino sees the versatile defender as a key part of Tottenham ‘s future and is adamant he is not for sale. 
But Mourinho has an incredible £200m plus transfer war-chest to spend this summer as he attempts to win back the Premier League for United. Reuters Dier in action against Stoke in the Premier League News Group Newspapers Ltd League Cup winner Jose Mourinho is keen on a move for Dier EPA Dier has scored twice in 15 internationals for England Eric Dier and England team mates attempt the strike series challenge 
It is thought Antoine Griezmann is top of his wish-list with an £80m bid lined up for the Atletico Madrid striker. 
But he also wants to add a central defender, midfielder and another full-back to his squad, as he pushes on from winning the League Cup this season. 
A source revealed: “United are interested in Dier, and looked at making a move for him in the January transfer window. Related stories Manchester United vs Bournemouth team news: Henrikh Mkhitaryan not likely to start despite return Snod in the dock Robert Snodgrass issued arrest warrant for failing to turn up to court over baby in car charges KARREN BRADY It's looking bad for our neighbours Leyton Orient MISS ME? Tony Pulis has last laugh at ex-club Crystal Palace by claiming Eagles have been big-money flops since he quit To be or not to be? What to expect if Craig Shakespeare is chosen to replace Claudio Ranieri as Leicester boss COR! STRIKER LIGHT Aitor Karanka ready to axe Boro's top scorer and turn to the striker with the worst winning record in Prem 
“Obviously that didn't come off, but Mourinho has him on a list of targets for the summer. He likes him. 
“Tottenham do not want to sell him under any circumstances, but you never know what can happen when the money is on the table.” 
Mourinho started the clear-out of his squad during January where he offloaded Memphis Depay and Morgan Schneiderlin. AP:Associated Press Dier tries to hurdle a challenge during Spurs' Europa League exit to Gent Getty Images Dier signed a five-year Spurs deal in September Reuters Spurs boss Pochettino will not want to lose the 23-year-old Tottenham's Dele Alli leaves teammate Eric Dier red-raced in water bottle challenge 
He managed to add around £35m to his transfer kitty without spending, and he has already drawm up a summer list of transfer targets. 
The former Chelsea manager has also looked at bringing in Roma defender Kostas Manolas or Benfica's Victor Lindelof in defence. 
Dier joined Tottenham from Portuguese side Sporting on a five-year deal for £4m in the summer of 2014. 
He has gone on to become a regular at White Hart Lane, making 88 appearances and scoring five goals. I love Erik Dier - Erik Dier loves me: Check out Tottenham’s song for midfield star
